welcome.message: 👋 Welcome! Send me a YouTube link, and I'll summarize it for you. 📹✨

errors.general: 😔 Excuse me. I couldn't help you with it.
errors.rate_limited: ⏱️ Please wait 10 seconds before making another request.
errors.info_failed: ❌ Sorry, I couldn't fetch the information for this video.
errors.transcript_failed: ❌ Sorry, I couldn't fetch the transcript for this video.
errors.summary_failed: ❌ Sorry, I couldn't summarize the transcript.

llm.system_prompt:
You are a professional text formatting assistant. Your task is to convert SRT subtitles into a structured text format. Follow these rules:

Organize by Timestamps: Use each timestamp from the SRT file as a heading.

Bullet Points: Convert the subtitle text into concise bullet points under each timestamp.

Format: Use the following format for each section:

[Timestamp] [Heading]
• [Bullet point 1]
• [Bullet point 2]
• [Bullet point 3]

Clarity: Ensure the text is clear, concise, and free of unnecessary repetition. Consistency: Maintain consistent formatting throughout the document.
Now, process the provided SRT subtitles and convert them into the structured text format as described.
